Sports and Clubs: Badminton; organised sports activities at District and Block level
Social And Cultural Activities: Took keen interest in social and economic upliftment of the students belonging to the disadvantaged groups of society; interested in organising cultural and sports activities to help the orphans and elderly women; organising plantation of trees in public places, drug de-addiction camps and blood donation camps for Baba Farid Club, Mohali (Punjab) for use of poor patients
Special Interests: Reading, gardening environmental and social evils
Educational Qualifications: M.A. (Economics),M.A. (Sociology),B. Ed. Educated at Punjab University, Chandigarh and Guru Nanak Dev University, Amritsar, Punjab
Other Information: Social Studies Teacher, Govt. Higher Secondary School, 1974-83; (i) Govt. High School, Chunnikalan, Ropar, 1983-86; (ii) Govt. Sr. Secondary School, Putigarh (Amritsar) (iii) Govt. Girls Sr. Secondary School, Ferozepur and (iv) Govt. Model Sr. Secondary School, Mohali, Phase -III B-1 (Ropar), 1996-2004; Amritsar and Faridkot, 1986-91; High School, Putligarh, Govt. High School, Nawankot, Amritsar, 1992-95; Retired from Government Senior Secondary School Mohali, Phase-III B-1, (Ropar) on 12 February 2004 and started political career; Delimitation Commission, 2004
